intro: Psychotria peperomiae, commonly known as the peppered psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, where it typically grows in shaded, humid environments. The plant is characterized by its small, opposite leaves that are often glossy and dark green. It produces small, white or pale yellow flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. Psychotria peperomiae is sometimes cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage.
